text: Ara yadi tomara asanka karo ye tomara etimadera prati n'yayaparayana hate paracha na, ta hale strilokadera madhyera yake tomadera bhalo lage take biye karate para -- du'i ba tina ba cara. Kintu yadi tomara asanka karo ye tomara samabyabahara karate parabe na, ta hale ekajanake'i, athaba tomadera dana hata yadera dhare rekheche. E'iti'i besi sangata yena tomara sare na ya'o.
